text: Final War or Final Wars may refer to: ==Fiction== * Final War, a term used in Honorverse, a military science-fiction book series by David Weber * Final War (novelette), a 1968 novelette by Barry N. Malzberg * "Final Wars" (song), a song by Buckethead from his 2006 studio album The Elephant Man's Alarm Clock * Godzilla: Final Wars, a 2004 Japanese science-fiction kaiju film directed by Ryuhei Kitamura ==History== * Final War of the Roman Republic * World War I, The War to End All Wars, or the Great War
title: Final War
